entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:22 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -22.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 2:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

Temperature: -22.5°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 75 %

Dewpoint: -25.7°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 35 with temperature rising to minus 29 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear early in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow in the evening. Light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35 with temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill minus 45 in the evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
